body: Interesting find.. So this doesn't work because of the relative filename. I guess doing a `$this->filename = realpath(pathinfo($filename)) . '/' . basename($filename)` in the constructor would fix it? Can you try and confirm that?
Hello, yes, it works but it would be nice if it also works with relative paths
